rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 28 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 12:10 PM, 10 July 2025(Thursday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Bataan, Bulacan, Metro Manila, Quezon, Rizal and Cavite within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Zambales(Botolan, San Marcelino, Cabangan, San Felipe, San Narciso), Nueva Ecija(Bongabon, Rizal), Tarlac(Bamban) and Pampanga(Porac) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
